# simd_ushort1

**Type Alias**

A vector of one 16-bit unsigned integer element.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias simd_ushort1 = UInt16
```

## Vector Data Types

- **simd_ushort2**: A vector of two 16-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_ushort3**: A vector of three 16-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_ushort4**: A vector of four 16-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_ushort8**: A vector of eight 16-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_ushort16**: A vector of sixteen 16-bit unsigned integer elements.
- **simd_ushort32**: A vector of thirty-two 16-bit unsigned integer elements.
